/* USE : VerManageMapper.getList */
SELECT tcpv.VER_SER_NO, tcpv.VER_SER_NM, tcpv.FILE_DESC, tcpv.FILE_SIZE, tcpv.FILE_DIR, tcpv.PROG_FG, tcpv.PGM_YN, tcpv.DB_YN, tcpv.IMG_YN, tcpv.USE_YN, tcpv.REG_DT, tcpv.REG_ID, tcpv.MOD_DT, tcpv.MOD_ID, tcpvs.REG_CNT, tcpvs.RECV_CNT
FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN tcpv, ( SELECT VER_SER_NO, NVL(SUM(DECODE(VER_RECV_FG, '1', 1, '2', 1, 0)), 0) REG_CNT, NVL(SUM(DECODE(VER_RECV_FG, '2', 1, 0)), 0) RECV_CNT FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN_STORE
WHERE STORE_CD IN (SELECT tms.STORE_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD =#{hqOfficeCd})
GROUP BY VER_SER_NO ) tcpvs
WHERE tcpvs.VER_SER_NO = tcpv.VER_SER_NO
WHERE tcpvs.VER_SER_NO (+)= tcpv.VER_SER_NO
AND tcpv.VER_SER_NO LIKE '%' || #{verSerNo} || '%'
AND tcpv.VER_SER_NM LIKE '%' || #{verSerNm} || '%'
AND tcpv.FILE_DESC = #{fileDesc}
AND tcpv.PROG_FG = #{progFg}
ORDER BY tcpv.REG_DT DESC

/* USE : VerManageMapper.dtlInfo */ SELECT tcpv.VER_SER_NO, tcpv.VER_SER_NM, tcpv.FILE_DIR, tcpv.FILE_NM, tcpv.FILE_EXT, tcpv.FILE_NM || '.' || FILE_EXT AS FILE_TOT_NM, tcpv.FILE_SIZE, tcpv.FILE_MIME_TYPE, tcpv.FILE_ORG_NM, tcpv.FILE_DESC, tcpv.PROG_FG, tcpv.PGM_YN, tcpv.DB_YN, tcpv.IMG_YN, tcpv.DEL_YN, tcpv.USE_YN, tcpv.REG_DT, tcpv.REG_ID FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN tcpv WHERE tcpv.VER_SER_NO = #{verSerNo} AND tcpv.DEL_YN = 'N'
